rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Main entrance hall with ramps for wheelchair access and energy-efficient lighting.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Large living area adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Compact eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, designed near the dining area.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: Open space that connects to both living and kitchen areas for ease of movement and natural light.

rooms.name: guest_room_1
rooms.description: Guest bedroom with access to courtyard view, ensuring privacy while maintaining eco-design principles.

rooms.name: servant_quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated servant's quarters integrated within the ground floor plan for ease of service and compliance with local norms.
